body:
Ye hi, its me again
I just wanted to apologise for the unpopular opinion thread. I had no idea it wasn't allowed and would have created it in the first place if I had known.
Thanks

title: Apology to the Admin

replies.body: Perhaps apologize in community slack/skype instead of making a thread?
replies.body_tagged: Perhaps apologize in community slack/skype instead of making a thread?

replies.body: Mmm, well if I were you then I'd take this on the chin and move on, no need to make an apology thread. Try to not cause any more drama.
replies.body_tagged: Mmm, well if I were you then I'd take this on the chin and move on, no need to make an apology thread. Try to not cause any more drama.

replies.body: What he did affected the forums, so why would he apologise in the slack?
